data.title: Adele and Rich Paul's Relationship Timeline: Inside Their Romance
data.meta_description: Time to go inside Adele and Rich Paul's romance with their complete relationship timeline, from when they started dating to those Adele engagement rumors.
data.text:
Adele and her husband Rich Paul are going strong (like, planning to have kids together strong!), so clearly, the time has come to go through every! single! detail! of their relationship to get you up to speed. Let‚Äôs jump in.

May 17, 2024

During one of her Weekends With Adele residency shows in Las Vegas, Adele shouts out Rich Paul's daughter, Reonna Simone Paul, who has just graduated from Clark Atlanta University.

‚ÄúIt is my stepdaughter‚Äôs graduation this weekend,‚Äù she is heard saying in a fan-captured video. ‚ÄúHer name is Reonna. So I love you, darling. Congratulations.‚Äù

Adele also takes a moment to gush at the fact that Reonna is the first member of her family to graduate from college and says Rich is in Atlanta celebrating with her. ‚ÄúAnd obviously I‚Äôm here with you‚Äîwouldn‚Äôt be anywhere else‚Äîbut I love you, baby. I love you!‚Äù

We're not crying, you are!

May 6, 2024

Update from Adele and Rich! A source tells People that the ‚Äúrelationship is solid,‚Äù adding that ‚Äúthey help each other and are good partners‚Äù and that Adele ‚Äúloves being with him.‚Äù

Love to hear it!

April 27, 2024

The celebs enjoy a courtside date night at Los Angeles‚Äôs Crypto.com Arena and watch the NBA playoffs between the Lakers and the Nuggets.

December 7, 2023

In her latest cover story for The Hollywood Reporter‚Äôs Women in Entertainment issue, Adele opens up about her relationship with Rich. First things first: She says he always hears her music when he‚Äôs traveling. ‚ÄúEvery time Richard travels, the airplanes always play my music, and we can‚Äôt work out if it‚Äôs because they know that we are together or if it‚Äôs just what they do,‚Äù she dishes.

She also gets emotional while speaking about Rich‚Äôs memoir, Lucky Me: A Memoir of Changing the Odds and how it recounts memories of his late mother.

‚ÄúRich and I have always known everything about each other since the day we got together. It was very emotional reading about his mum, because obviously she‚Äôs not with us, so I‚Äôve never met her,‚Äù the Grammy winner shares through tears. ‚ÄúAnd she‚Äôs such a big part of Richard and the kids and the kids‚Äô mum‚Äôs life and stuff like that. But I knew all about it. I‚Äôm getting a bit emotional. It was hard for him to write that.‚Äù

November 18, 2023

Well, well, well, rumor has it (heh) that these two are married! While attending her close friend Alan Carr‚Äôs Los Angeles comedy show, the singer reportedly reveals the marriage news in a spontaneous mid-show moment, per two audience members who end up spilling all the üçµ to DeuxMoi.

‚ÄúI was at Alan Carr‚Äôs comedy show in L.A. tonight and Adele was in the audience. Alan asked the crowd if anyone got married recently and Adele shouted ‚ÄòI did,‚Äô‚Äù one insider writes.

Meanwhile, a second showgoer notes, ‚ÄúWhen [Carr] asked if anyone got married recently, [Adele] yelled ‚ÄòI did.‚Äô Super cute all around and was super sweet but dipped right before it ended.‚Äù ‚ÄúAdele was sitting right behind me with a friend having the best time. Her security only came in to bring her snacks. She didn‚Äôt care if people knew she was there. She was heckling [Carr]‚Äîthey‚Äôre best friends,‚Äù they add.

Brb, currently going through an entire box of Kleenex with all these tears!

October 5, 2023

Update! Adele and Rich aren‚Äôt married‚Äîthey‚Äôre just into calling each other ‚Äúhusband‚Äù and ‚Äúwife.‚Äù As a source puts it to Us Weekly, ‚ÄúThey aren‚Äôt married, but they do call each other ‚Äòhusband‚Äô and ‚Äòwife‚Äô and have been for a while now.‚Äù Actually, Rich started calling Adele his wife about two months into dating and ‚ÄúAdele loved the security [of it] and how much he adores her.‚Äù

As for when they do tie the knot, ‚ÄúMarriage is really just a ceremony at this point. They [already] live and act as husband and wife.‚Äù

September 24, 2023

Hot on the heels of calling Rich her husband, Adele refers to herself as his ‚Äúwife‚Äù while telling fans she doesn‚Äôt understand American football despite Rich loving it.

‚ÄúWhy does the whistle always get blown? Why is it four yards? Why are there inches? Why does it stop when it gets fucking exciting?‚Äù she asked, adding that she‚Äôs ‚Äúnot the greatest wife, really, when it comes to football‚Äîeven though my partner absolutely loves it.‚Äù

September 17, 2023

Adele casually calls Rich her ‚Äúhusband‚Äù while chatting with fans, leading to inevitable speculation that they got married without telling any of us.

August 26, 2023

Adele reveals she wants to have a baby ‚Äúsoon‚Äù and let fans in on her baby name list!

June 18, 2023

Adele says she plans on being with Rich for the rest of her life. Awwww!

April 14, 2023

Adele crashes Rich‚Äôs stream and it‚Äôs hilarious and amazing:

December 17, 2022

Rich Paul celebrates his 41st birthday in the absolute most iconic way possible: at the Adele show in Las Vegas. Naturally, she takes a few moments during her concert at Caesars Palace to sing ‚ÄúHappy Birthday‚Äù to him!!!

‚ÄúI love you more than life itself‚Äîwe wish you happy birthday,‚Äù Adele says from the stage. Tear ducts = activated.

August 15, 2022

In her stunning (!!) cover story for ELLE‚Äôs September issue, the singer ever-so-briefly discusses her relationship with her boyfriend. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never been in love like this. I‚Äôm obsessed with him,‚Äù she gushes. Then, when asked by the publication if she would ever want to remarry, she says, ‚ÄúYes, absolutely.‚Äù Oh, and ‚ÄúI definitely want more kids...I‚Äôm a homemaker and I‚Äôm a matriarch, and a stable life helps me with my music. But right now, all I got in my brain is [my upcoming Las Vegas residency]. I wanna f*cking nail it.‚Äù

June 11, 2022

During an interview with E! News, Rich hints at the possibility of expanding his family and discusses having ‚Äúmore kids‚Äù and being ‚Äúan older dad.‚Äù He muses, ‚ÄúAs a young dad, growing a business, it was pretty tough...But now looking as an older dad and my kids being much older, and obviously, if I was to have more kids...I‚Äôm looking forward to being a different dad, a more patient dad.‚Äù S‚Äôcute!

May 11, 2022

After just about a year of dating, Adele posts a series of pics showing herself and Rich looking v loved-up along with the caption, ‚ÄúTime flies.‚Äù

Oh, and that mansion in the first pic? Apparently, Adele and Rich bought it...to live in...together. Per Just Jared, the massive 21,000-square-foot Beverly Park home was previously owned by Sylvester Stallone and sold to Adele and Rich for $58 million. Casual.

Further evidence that things are going v well: Right around the same time, an anonymous tipster submits a blind item that‚Äôs most definitely about Adele and Rich to IG gossip guru @DeuxMoi, saying that the two are ‚Äúendgame.‚Äù According to the source, ‚ÄúHe put a ring on it.‚Äù Okay!!

May 5, 2022

After a few quiet months with zero sightings of the couple, Adele turns 34...but she doesn‚Äôt appear to celebrate with Rich. Instead, the agent spends the night in Miami, per Page Six, where he‚Äôs spotted hanging out with LeBron James at the American Express Presents Carbone Beach dinner party. Hmm....

But just a few days later, Rich seems to make it up to Adele by taking her on a belated birthday getaway to Napa Valley. ‚ÄúAdele is still seeing Rich,‚Äù a source tells People. ‚ÄúThey are both very busy though. She is working on her residency and Rich is busy with his clients. They see each other when they can.‚Äù

February 20, 2022

Adele and Rich once again sit courtside at an NBA All-Star game in Ohio and look wildly in love. Oh, and fans note that Adele is wearing what definitely looks to be a simple gold wedding band instead of that big diamond.

February 11, 2022

Adele visits The Graham Norton Show and says that her rescheduled Vegas show is definitely happening this year because she wants to have a baby next year. Um??? She adds, ‚ÄúI have plans next year. Imagine if I have to cancel because I am having a baby!‚Äù

She also addresses speculation that she and Rich are engaged, saying, ‚ÄúAs if I would ever tell anyone if I was or wasn‚Äôt.‚Äù V coy, Adele.

February 8, 2022

In a surprising twist, Adele shows up to the 2022 Brit Awards casually wearing what looks like a massive engagement ring. Just peep that Lorraine Schwartz pear-shape sparkler!

February 1, 2022

Adele decides to shut down those rumors of relationship troubles with a post on IG. Alongside a cute pic of herself, she writes, ‚ÄúHiya, so I‚Äôm really happy to say that I am performing at the Brits next week!! Anddddd I‚Äôll also be popping in to see Graham for a chat on the couch while I‚Äôm in town too! I‚Äôm looking forward to it! Oh, and Rich sends his love.‚Äù Case closed.

The next day, a source for Us Weekly says Rich and Adele are ‚Äústill solid‚Äù and ‚Äúcommitted‚Äù to their relationship despite the tension brought on by the residency drama, noting that Rich has been ‚Äúvery patient and supportive‚Äù of his GF.

January 25, 2022

Speculation mounts that Adele canceled her Las Vegas residency due to drama with Rich. By which we mean that a source tells Page Six, ‚ÄúAdele‚Äôs been crying and couldn‚Äôt get through a single full rehearsal for the past month. Just constantly on the phone with Rich‚Ä¶loudly shouting and sobbing.‚Äù Yikes.

Oh, and another source says, ‚ÄúShe and Rich had been fighting, and their relationship was volatile before she canceled her dates. Adele is very emotional and dramatic. He‚Äôs an NBA guy who has to go on the road‚Äîthey are very different‚Äîand they hit a rough patch.‚Äù

January 7, 2022

Another night, another NBA courtside date, with Adele and Rich looking cute as ever and laughing together throughout the game.

December 10, 2021

Adele supports Rich‚Äôs New Balance sneaker collab by posting several pics of herself rocking a pair of Rich Paul 550s to her IG Story. Love to see a supportive GF.

Not long after, they are spotted at an NFL game, even holding hands at one point.

November 11, 2021

During an interview with Rolling Stone, Adele says that she and Rich first met years ago at a mutual friend‚Äôs birthday party while they were both dancing to Drake. She also reveals that she reconnected with Rich one week after her estranged father passed away in May 2021.

Three days later, Adele‚Äôs concert special, Adele One Night Only, airs on CBS, which includes a sit-down interview between Adele and Oprah Winfrey. During the interview, she says that her relationship with Rich is the first time that she‚Äôs loved herself enough to be really able to love someone else. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs just timing,‚Äù she explains. ‚ÄúBut it‚Äôd be interesting to see what my reaction is like in general to anything that hurts me now that I feel so secure in myself, and I‚Äôm talking outside of romance as well.‚Äù

October 13, 2021

A source tells Us Weekly that Adele and Rich ‚Äúcomplement each other perfectly‚Äù and ‚Äúare in a fantastic place‚Äù in their relationship. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre very committed at this point and it‚Äôs hard to imagine they won‚Äôt be together for an extremely long time,‚Äù the source says, adding, ‚ÄúShe really feels like she hit the jackpot.‚Äù

Less than a week later, Adele and Rich are spotted courtside at another NBA game, this time between the Golden State Warriors and the Los Angeles Lakers in L.A. Go sports!

October 7, 2021

Adele opens up about Rich to Vogue, saying he‚Äôs ‚Äújust so f*cking funny‚Äù and that ‚Äúhe was always there‚Äù but she ‚Äújust didn‚Äôt see him‚Äù as a romantic prospect until recently. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt feel anxious or nervous or frazzled,‚Äù she adds. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs quite the opposite. It‚Äôs wild....I‚Äôm a 33-year-old divorced mother of a son, who‚Äôs actually in charge. The last thing I need is someone who doesn‚Äôt know where they‚Äôre at or what they want. I know what I want. And I really know what I don‚Äôt want.‚Äù

September 19, 2021

Adele and Rich go Instagram official (!!!!) on the last slide of this IG photo dump from NBA star Anthony Davis‚Äôs wedding to Marlen P, so it seems like their relationship is legit:

A few days later, a source tells E! News that Adele is ‚Äúvery much in love with Rich‚Äù and that things are getting ‚Äúmore serious‚Äù between them. ‚ÄúThey have both met each other‚Äôs kids but have been keeping it low-key around them,‚Äù the insider explains. ‚ÄúThey both stay at each other‚Äôs places in L.A. and are pretty much inseparable. She feels really comfortable around him and is in a good headspace right now. She is all about having fun and being in good company and Rich definitely provides that.‚Äù

August 4, 2021

A source tells Us Weekly that Adele and Rich have actually been together ‚Äúfor months,‚Äù adding, ‚ÄúThey have traveled with each other between Los Angeles and New York. He‚Äôs very shy and keeps a low profile when they go out, whereas Adele is super sociable.‚Äù

According to the source, the two run in the same social circle, so it‚Äôs been easy to keep things on the lowdown. As they explain, ‚ÄúThe people they hang out with know them both personally already, so they don‚Äôt have to introduce each other, which is probably why nobody picked up on their relationship sooner.‚Äù Makes sense!

July 17, 2021

Adele and Rich are spotted together for the first time at a Milwaukee Bucks and Phoenix Suns NBA game in Phoenix. Ofc, it isn‚Äôt long before dating rumors start circulating.

Amusingly, the news comes from an ESPN host named Brian Windhorst, who accidentally blows up their spot on his podcast the next day, musing, ‚ÄúRich Paul, [LeBron James‚Äôs] agent, brings his girlfriend to the game sitting next to LeBron. His girlfriend is Adele. Rich Paul is at the game with Adele. This is the first time they‚Äôve come out in public together, so this will be all over the tabloids, especially in England tomorrow.‚Äù Lol, oops.

May 31, 2021

In a , Rich teases that he‚Äôs been ‚Äúhanging out‚Äù with a ‚Äúmajor pop star‚Äù lately, although he doesn‚Äôt name names. He‚Äôs also quick to add, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not dating, I‚Äôm single. Put that in the story.‚Äù

October 8, 2020
